text: sava, rakta hagu handiya mansavannu mattu allahana horatu an'yara hesaralli kadiyaladavugalannu (antaha pranigalannu) nim'ma palige nisedhisalagide. Innu obba vyakti tira asahayaka sthitiyalli, vidrohada iradeyillade, hagu mitimirade (adarindenadaru tindu bittare) avana mele papavenilla. Allahanu khandita ksamisuvavanu mattu karunaluvagiddane
